name: Stonks (MonoFlauta, TaaroBravo, unhusher)
description:
Stonks is a meme investment simulator game where you will be given the ultimate dream of knowing how well you would do if you invested your money without actually having to deal with the financial loss. The main feature of this game is that uses real stock and crypto values. So you will be playing with real-life data!

Won't you be happy to not have lost all your money? Will you be mad that you could have won a lot of money? Find out playing this game!

FEATURES

  • Stocks purchase and sell simulation
  • Crypto purchase and sell simulation
  • Fixed Term Deposit simulation
  • Tons of Fashion Objects you can buy for fun
  • Memes

CREDITS

Artist: Agustín Inclan

Programming: Lautaro Bravo de la Serna & Facundo Balboa

Music: Santiago Bravo de la Serna

Also available in the PlayStore!
